definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: A bar line is a vertical line through the staff or system to mark a metrical division, corresponding to the time signature.
sentences.chinese: 小節線是與五線譜或譜表垂直的豎線，與拍號相對應。
